title: [1508521049] Perfect Slow-Cooked Beef - Gordon Ramsay
description:
Gordon shows you how to slow-cook beef shin, utilising the marrow to make delicious gravy. Adding just a few simple ingredients creates an incredibly fresh and satisfying dish full of different tastes and textures for you to try at home.

Subscribe for weekly cooking videos. 

If you liked this clip check out the rest of Gordon's channels:

http://www.youtube.com/gordonramsay
http://www.youtube.com/kitchennightmares
http://www.youtube.com/thefword
